a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cancer death rates in children under 5 years old
Reported annual death rate from childhood cancers, per 100,000 children aged under five, based on the

underlying cause
listed on death certificates. This is shown for all
malignant
cancers combined, brain and

nervous system cancers, leukemia , lymphomas and
multiple myeloma
.

g.text: All malignant cancers combined All malignant cancers combined
Brain and nervous system cancers Brain and nervous system cancers
Lymphomas and multiple myeloma Lymphomas and multiple myeloma

text.tspan: Note: Figures may fluctuate greatly due to low numbers, especially in countries with smaller populations. Comparisons may be affected by
